dt: {bc}a state of intellectual or emotional balance {bc}{sx|poise||}
{bc}a state of adjustment between opposing or divergent influences or elements

{bc}a state of balance between opposing forces or actions that is either static (as in a body acted on by forces whose resultant is zero) or dynamic (as in a reversible chemical reaction when the rates of reaction in both directions are equal)

et: Latin {it}aequilibrium{/it}, from {it}aequilibris{/it} being in equilibrium, from {it}aequi-{/it} + {it}libra{/it} weight, balance
shortdef: a state of intellectual or emotional balance : poise
a state of adjustment between opposing or divergent influences or elements

a state of balance between opposing forces or actions that is either static (as in a body acted on by forces whose resultant is zero) or dynamic (as in a reversible chemical reaction when the rates of reaction in both directions are equal)
